item.content:encoded:
Is your dog a champion chewer? Do they destroy every toy within minutes? Then you need the Tonka Rubber Diamond Plate Ball. Built with the legendary toughness of Tonka, this isn’t just another dog toy – it’s an investment in hours of fun and a solution to your destructive dog’s chewing habits. The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball is designed to withstand even the most powerful jaws, making it the perfect choice for fetch, training, and solo play. It’s the ultimate toy for dogs of all sizes, promising long-lasting entertainment and peace of mind for you.

Key Takeaways:

  • Extreme Durability: Built with Tonka’s “Real Tough” materials, designed for even the most enthusiastic chewers.
  • Versatile Play: Suitable for fetch, training, and independent chewing.
  • All-Weather & Safe: Weather-resistant, water-resistant, and designed with dog safety in mind.
  • Suitable for All Sizes: The 3-inch size is appropriate for small, medium, and large breeds.
  • Dental Health Benefits: Promotes healthy chewing habits.
Check price

Why Choose the Tonka Diamond Plate Ball?

We understand the frustration of constantly replacing dog toys. That’s why we engineered the Tonka Diamond Plate Ball with durability, versatility, and safety as our top priorities.

  • Tonka Tough Construction: This isn’t just a catchy slogan; it’s a promise. The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball is crafted from specially formulated, durable rubber designed to withstand aggressive chewing and rough play. Its unique diamond plate texture not only adds to its rugged appearance but also enhances its grip and durability. We’ve taken the same “Real Tough” philosophy that makes Tonka trucks legendary and applied it to this dog toy, ensuring it can handle even the most enthusiastic chewers. This means you can say goodbye to shredded toys and hello to long-lasting play.  
  • Perfect for Fetch & Training: The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball isn’t just about chewing; it’s about interactive fun. Its bouncy nature makes it ideal for games of fetch, providing your dog with plenty of exercise and mental stimulation. The textured surface provides a good grip for both you and your dog, making it easy to throw and catch. Whether you’re working on retrieving skills, practicing obedience commands, or simply enjoying a playful game in the park, this ball is the perfect companion. It also works great for solo play, keeping your dog entertained even when you’re busy.  
  • Weather & Water Resistant: Don’t let the weather dictate playtime. The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball is designed for both indoor and outdoor use. Its weather and water-resistant construction means you can take it to the park, the beach, or even let your dog play with it in the rain without worrying about damage. The durable material resists fading and degradation from the elements, ensuring that this toy remains a favorite for seasons to come.  
  • Promotes Healthy Chewing: Chewing is a natural instinct for dogs, and providing them with appropriate outlets for this behavior is crucial for their well-being. The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball provides a safe and satisfying chewing experience. The textured surface helps massage gums and promote dental health by gently scraping away plaque and tartar buildup as your dog chews. This helps maintain healthy teeth and gums, contributing to your dog’s overall health and happiness.  
  • Perfect for All Breeds: Finding a toy that’s suitable for all dog sizes can be a challenge. The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball addresses this issue with its carefully designed 3-inch size. This size is ideal for small, medium, and large breeds, ensuring that every dog can enjoy the benefits of this durable and versatile toy. While some may perceive it as having a substantial feel, this is a testament to its robust construction and contributes to its long-lasting durability.
  • Safety Tested: Your dog’s safety is our top priority. The Tonka Diamond Plate Ball is designed with your dog’s well-being in mind. It’s made from non-toxic materials and undergoes rigorous testing to ensure it meets the highest safety standards. We understand that dogs can be enthusiastic chewers, so we’ve taken extra precautions to create a toy that’s both durable and safe for your furry friend. You can have peace of mind knowing that your dog is playing with a toy that’s been carefully designed and tested for their safety.  

What Dog Owners Are Saying

Dog owners consistently praise the Tonka Diamond Plate Ball for its exceptional durability. Many have shared stories of how this ball has withstood the relentless chewing of their powerful dogs, outlasting other toys that were quickly destroyed. They appreciate the long-lasting construction and the value it provides.

Owners also highlight the enjoyment their dogs experience with this toy. They note that the ball is a favorite for fetch and other interactive games, and they appreciate its sturdy construction and vibrant colors, which make it easy to spot during outdoor play. The ease of visibility is a welcome feature for many, especially during games in tall grass or at the park.

Furthermore, many customers have described the ball as a solid and well-made product that meets their expectations for a durable dog toy. They appreciate the quality of the materials and the robust design, confirming their confidence in its ability to withstand regular use and enthusiastic play.

Product Specifications

  • Size: 3 inches – a perfect size for dogs of all breeds.
  • Material: Durable Rubber with Diamond Plate Texture – engineered for maximum toughness and grip.  
  • Intended for: Dogs of all sizes – from small pups to large breeds.

A Toy That Lasts

The Tonka Rubber Diamond Plate Ball is more than just a toy; it’s a solution for dog owners tired of constantly replacing destroyed playthings. It’s an investment in your dog’s happiness and well-being, providing hours of entertainment, promoting healthy chewing habits, and offering peace of mind knowing that your dog is playing with a safe and durable toy.

We understand the bond you share with your dog, and we believe they deserve the best. That’s why we’ve created the Tonka Diamond Plate Ball – a toy that’s built to last, designed for fun, and crafted with your dog’s safety in mind. Choose the Tonka Diamond Plate Ball and give your dog a toy they’ll love for years to come.

item.content:encoded:
Introducing the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug Dog Toy – the ultimate playtime companion built for tough play and endless fun. Inspired by the legendary durability of Tonka trucks, this toy is designed to withstand even the most enthusiastic chewers and provide hours of engaging entertainment for your furry friend. If you’re looking for a toy that can keep up with your dog’s boundless energy, look no further.

Key Takeaways:

  • Ultra-Durable Tire Core: Built with Tonka-tough materials for long-lasting play, even with aggressive chewers.
  • High-Visibility Design: Bright yellow and black colors make it easy to spot during outdoor play.
  • Ideal for Medium & Large Breeds: 15-inch length provides a good grip and satisfying tug for larger dogs.
  • Versatile Play: Suitable for fetch, tug-of-war, and training.
  • Rope Component Provides Added Interest: While not indestructible, the rope offers textural variety and engagement.
Check price

Built for Tough Play

The Tonka name has been synonymous with toughness and durability for generations. Just like the iconic steel trucks that have inspired countless childhood adventures, the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug is built to last. The core of this toy is crafted from robust materials designed to resist even aggressive chewing. This isn’t just another dog toy; it’s a Tonka.  

One of the biggest challenges with dog toys, especially during outdoor play, is keeping track of them. The Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug solves this problem with its high-visibility design. The bright yellow and black color scheme makes it easy to spot, whether you’re playing in the park, the backyard, or even at the beach. No more searching through tall grass or under bushes – this toy stands out, ensuring you and your dog can focus on the fun.  

This toy isn’t just about toughness; it’s also about engagement. The durable rope component adds an extra dimension to playtime, perfect for tug-of-war, fetching, and interactive play. The rope offers a satisfying texture for your dog to grip and pull, adding variety to their play experience. While the tire itself is built for extreme durability, the rope is designed to provide engaging texture and may show signs of wear with particularly aggressive chewers. This is a normal part of its function as an interactive element. The focus of this toy is its long-lasting, ultra-durable tire.  

At 15 inches long, the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug is perfectly sized for medium and large breed dogs. The length provides a comfortable grip for both dogs and their owners during tug-of-war, and it’s also ideal for throwing and retrieving. This toy offers a satisfying size and weight that allows for dynamic play.  

Whether it’s a sunny day at the park or a rainy afternoon in the backyard, the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug is ready for action. The toy is designed to be weather and water-resistant, so you don’t have to worry about it getting damaged by the elements. This means more playtime, no matter the weather.  

Product Specifications

  • Dimensions: 15 inches length
  • Breed Size: Recommended for medium and large breeds.
  • Safety Information: Always supervise your pet during play. Inspect toy regularly for damage and replace if necessary.

What Dog Owners Are Saying

Dog owners have consistently praised the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug for its exceptional durability, particularly the tire portion. Many have shared stories of their dogs, even those known for their powerful chewing habits, being unable to make a dent in the tough tire. This has made it a favorite for owners seeking a long-lasting toy that can withstand rigorous play.  

The high visibility of the toy has also been a recurring highlight in customer feedback. Owners appreciate how easy it is to spot the bright yellow and black toy during outdoor play, preventing it from getting lost and maximizing playtime.

While some have noted that the rope component may show signs of wear with heavy chewing, they emphasize that the tire itself remains remarkably intact. This reinforces the toy’s core value: a durable tire built for tough play. The rope provides additional texture and engagement.

Owners of various breeds and sizes, within the medium to large breed range, have reported their dogs enjoying the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug. The size and weight are well-suited for interactive play, providing a satisfying tug-of-war experience for both dogs and their owners.

Tips for Play and Care

To ensure the safety of your pet and maximize the lifespan of your Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug, please follow these guidelines:

  • Supervise Playtime: Always supervise your pet during play sessions, especially during initial introductions to the toy. This allows you to monitor their play style and ensure they are using the toy safely.
  • Regular Inspections: Regularly inspect the toy for any signs of damage, such as cracks, tears, or loose parts. If you notice any damage, remove the toy immediately and replace it with a new one.
  • Cleaning Instructions: To clean the Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug, hand wash it with mild soap and water. Rinse thoroughly and allow it to air dry completely before giving it back to your dog.
  • Appropriate Use: This toy is designed for interactive play, such as fetching and tug-of-war. It is not intended for aggressive chewing sessions where the dog is left unsupervised with the toy for extended periods.  

Ready for Tonka-Tough Play?

The Tonka Mega Tread Rope Tug Dog Toy is more than just a toy; it’s an investment in countless hours of fun and engaging play for you and your furry friend. Built with the same legendary durability that has made Tonka a household name, this toy is designed to withstand even the most enthusiastic play sessions. Get yours today and unleash the fun!

item.content:encoded:
Is your furry friend a relentless chewer? Do you find yourself constantly replacing torn and tattered dog toys? Look no further than the Tonka 3-Ring Tug, a toy engineered for durability and designed for endless hours of interactive play. Built with the same “Tonka tough” spirit that has made the brand synonymous with resilience, this toy is ready to withstand even the most enthusiastic play sessions.

Key Takeaways:

  • Ultra-Durable Design: Made with Tonka-tough materials, this tug toy is built to withstand rigorous play and chewing, offering a longer lifespan than many other dog toys.
  • Engaging Play: The 3-ring design facilitates interactive play, including fetch, tug-of-war, and training exercises, keeping dogs mentally and physically stimulated.
  • Safe and Visible: Designed with safety in mind and featuring high-visibility colors, this toy is easy to track during outdoor play and helps prevent accidents.
  • Suitable for Medium and Large Breeds: The 10.5-inch size is ideal for medium and large dogs, offering a comfortable grip for both pets and owners.
Check price

Built for Tough Play: Key Features

The Tonka 3-Ring Tug isn’t just another dog toy; it’s a testament to robust design and thoughtful engineering. Each feature is carefully considered to provide a superior play experience for both dogs and their owners.  

Tonka Tough Material: The secret to the Tonka 3-Ring Tug’s exceptional durability lies in its construction. Crafted from specially formulated materials, this toy is designed to withstand the rigors of intense chewing and pulling. Unlike many other dog toys that quickly succumb to teeth and claws, the Tonka 3-Ring Tug is built to last. This robust construction ensures that your dog can enjoy countless hours of play without you having to worry about constant replacements. The material is designed to resist tearing and ripping, even under significant pressure, providing a long-lasting and reliable toy.  

3-Ring Design: The innovative 3-ring design is what truly sets this toy apart. This unique configuration offers a multitude of play possibilities, making it far more versatile than traditional single-piece toys.

  • Tug-of-War: The rings provide multiple secure gripping points for both dogs and owners, making it ideal for exciting games of tug-of-war. This interactive play strengthens the bond between you and your pet while providing a healthy physical workout.  
  • Fetching: The distinct shape and weight of the toy make it perfect for fetching. Its aerodynamic design allows for long throws, encouraging your dog to run and retrieve. The bright colors make it easy to spot, even in tall grass or low-light conditions.  
  • Carrying and Chewing: The rings offer a comfortable grip for dogs to carry the toy around, and the durable material provides a satisfying chewing experience. This helps to satisfy their natural urge to chew, potentially diverting them from chewing on furniture or other household items.  

High Visibility: Losing a dog toy during outdoor play can be frustrating. The Tonka 3-Ring Tug addresses this issue with its vibrant yellow and black color scheme. These high-visibility colors make the toy easy to spot, even in tall grass, wooded areas, or during dusk and dawn. This ensures that you and your dog can always keep track of the toy, maximizing playtime and minimizing the risk of losing it. This feature is especially beneficial for dogs with poor eyesight or during low-light conditions.  

Weather and Water Resistant: Whether it’s a sunny day at the park or a drizzly afternoon in the backyard, the Tonka 3-Ring Tug is ready for action. Its weather-resistant design ensures that it can withstand the elements without deteriorating. The toy is also water-resistant, meaning it can be used for water play without absorbing water and becoming heavy or waterlogged. This makes it a great option for dogs who love to swim or play near water.  

Size and Breed Suitability: Designed with medium and large breeds in mind, the Tonka 3-Ring Tug measures a substantial 10.5 inches in length. This size provides a comfortable and secure grip for larger dogs, allowing them to fully engage in play without struggling to hold onto the toy. While smaller dogs can also enjoy this toy, its size and weight are optimized for medium and large breeds.  

What Dog Owners Are Saying

While the features speak for themselves, the experiences of other dog owners provide valuable insights into the real-world performance of the Tonka 3-Ring Tug.

Many owners have praised the toy’s exceptional durability, noting that it has outlasted numerous other toys that their dogs have quickly destroyed. They’ve highlighted its ability to withstand aggressive chewing and pulling, making it a valuable investment for owners of powerful chewers.  

Dog owners have also emphasized the toy’s versatility, noting that their dogs enjoy a variety of play activities with it, from tug-of-war to fetching and carrying. They’ve appreciated how the 3-ring design facilitates interactive play and keeps their dogs engaged and entertained.  

The value proposition of the Tonka 3-Ring Tug has also been a recurring theme in owner feedback. Many have noted that its durability and versatility justify its price, making it a worthwhile purchase compared to repeatedly buying cheaper, less durable toys.

Tips for Optimal Use and Care

To ensure the longevity and safety of your Tonka 3-Ring Tug, please follow these simple guidelines:

  • Supervise Initial Play: During the first few play sessions, it’s essential to supervise your dog to ensure they are using the toy appropriately. This will also allow you to assess their chewing habits and identify any potential safety concerns.
  • Regular Inspections: Regularly inspect the toy for any signs of wear and tear, such as cracks, tears, or missing pieces. If you notice any damage, remove the toy immediately to prevent your dog from ingesting any small parts.
  • Cleaning Instructions: To clean the toy, simply wash it with mild soap and water. Rinse thoroughly and allow it to air dry completely before giving it back to your dog.
  • Proper Storage: When not in use, store the toy in a dry place away from direct sunlight and extreme temperatures. This will help to maintain its integrity and prolong its lifespan.

Product Details

  • Product Dimensions: 10.5 inches  
  • Model Number: 5038

The Tonka 3-Ring Tug is more than just a dog toy; it’s an investment in your dog’s happiness and well-being. Its durable construction, versatile design, and focus on safety make it a top choice for dog owners seeking a long-lasting and engaging toy. Give your furry friend the gift of endless play with the Tonka 3-Ring Tug.

item.content:encoded:
Inspire your little builder with the Tonka Tough Toolbox Set! This durable set includes 12 realistic tools, a portable carrying case, and a buildable workbench for hours of imaginative, screen-free play. Designed for little hands and built to withstand enthusiastic play, this set is the perfect introduction to the world of building and creating.

Key Takeaways:

  • Real-World Play: Encourages active, imaginative play away from screens.
  • Durable and Kid-Friendly: Designed for little hands and built to withstand enthusiastic play.
  • Complete Set: Includes 12 tools and accessories, a carrying case, and a buildable workbench.
  • Perfect for Toddlers: Ideal size and features for children aged 2 and up.
  • Generational Fun: Part of the Tonka legacy of durable, engaging toys loved by families for over 75 years.
Check price

Built for Big Imaginations

The Tonka Tough Toolbox Set isn’t just a toy; it’s a gateway to a world of imaginative play. With its realistic tools, convenient carrying case, and buildable workbench, this set provides everything your child needs to embark on countless building adventures.  

  • 12 Realistic Tools: This set features 12 essential tools that mimic the real thing, allowing your child to feel like a true construction pro. From the trusty hammer for pounding and shaping to the versatile wrench for tightening and loosening, each tool is designed for little hands to grip and maneuver easily. The set also includes a screwdriver for fastening, a saw for “cutting,” and other essential tools that encourage role-play and develop fine motor skills. As children grasp, lift, and manipulate these tools, they refine their hand-eye coordination and build essential dexterity. They will develop their problem-solving skills as they figure out how to use each tool for different tasks.  
  • Portable Carrying Case: Keep all the tools organized and ready for action with the included carrying case. This durable case not only provides convenient storage but also makes it easy for your child to take their building adventures on the go. Whether they’re heading to the backyard, a friend’s house, or just moving from room to room, the carrying case ensures that all their tools are safely stored and readily accessible. This feature also promotes responsibility and organization as children learn to pack up their tools after playtime.  
  • Buildable Workbench: Transform any play area into a construction zone with the included buildable workbench. This sturdy surface provides a dedicated workspace for your little builder to tackle their projects. Whether they’re pretending to fix a toy truck, construct a birdhouse, or simply experiment with the tools, the workbench provides a stable and engaging platform for their imaginative play. This feature enhances the play experience by creating a realistic construction environment.  
  • Durable Tonka Tough Construction: True to the Tonka legacy, this toolbox set is built to last. Made from durable, high-quality materials, it can withstand the rigors of enthusiastic play. Parents can rest assured that this set is designed to endure countless hours of imaginative building and creating. This robust construction ensures that the Tonka Tough Toolbox Set will be a cherished toy for years to come.  
  • Screen-Free Play: In today’s digital world, it’s more important than ever to encourage children to engage in active, screen-free play. The Tonka Tough Toolbox Set provides the perfect opportunity for kids to put down their screens and engage in imaginative, hands-on activities. This type of play fosters creativity, problem-solving skills, and social interaction. It also promotes physical activity as children move around and engage with the tools and workbench.  

Over 75 Years of Tough

For over 75 years, Tonka has been a trusted name in toys, creating durable, high-quality vehicles and playsets that have been passed down through generations. From the iconic Mighty Dump Truck to a wide range of other construction vehicles and playsets, Tonka has inspired countless hours of imaginative play for children around the world.  

The Tonka story began in 1947 in Mound, Minnesota, where a small company called Mound Metalcraft began producing metal toys. In 1955, the company introduced the first Tonka toy, a metal steam shovel. The name “Tonka” comes from the Dakota Sioux word “Tanka,” which means “great” or “big.”  

From the very beginning, Tonka toys were known for their exceptional durability. They were built to withstand the rough and tumble play of children, both indoors and outdoors. This commitment to quality quickly made Tonka a beloved brand among families.

Over the decades, Tonka has continued to innovate and expand its product line, introducing new vehicles, playsets, and accessories that capture the imaginations of children. But through all the changes, one thing has remained constant: Tonka’s commitment to creating tough, durable toys that inspire imaginative play. The Tonka Tough Toolbox Set continues this legacy, offering children a hands-on experience that encourages creativity, problem-solving, and good old-fashioned fun.  

What Parents Are Saying

Parents are thrilled with the Tonka Tough Toolbox Set, noting its perfect size for toddlers and its ability to keep children engaged for extended periods. Many appreciate the set’s durability, knowing it can withstand the wear and tear of active play. Grandparents often choose this as a gift, recognizing its potential for creating shared play experiences between generations. The set’s focus on screen-free play is also a significant plus for parents seeking engaging alternatives to digital entertainment.

Specifications

  • Product Name: Tonka Tough Toolbox Set
  • Item Number: 06235
  • Age Recommendation: 2+ years
  • Includes: 12 toy tools, carrying case, buildable workbench  
  • Materials: Durable plastic

Bring Home the Tonka Tough Toolbox Set Today!

The Tonka Tough Toolbox Set is more than just a toy; it’s an investment in your child’s imagination and development. It’s a chance to introduce them to the joy of building, creating, and playing in the real world. With its durable construction, realistic tools, and engaging features, this set is sure to provide hours of fun for years to come.

Get ready to unleash your child’s inner builder with the Tonka Tough Builders Playset! This isn’t just a toy; it’s a gateway to a world of imaginative play, where creativity takes shape, and little hands build big dreams. Packed with 25 vibrant building blocks, a sturdy Tonka hard hat, and a versatile storage bucket that doubles as a building base, this playset offers endless opportunities for construction, role-play, and on-the-go fun.

Key Takeaways:

  • Imaginative Play: Encourages open-ended, screen-free play through building and role-playing.
  • Durable and Versatile: Includes 25 colorful blocks, a wearable hard hat, and a storage bucket that doubles as a building base.
  • Portable and Convenient: Easy to store and transport, making it suitable for both home and on-the-go play.

Built for Big Imaginations

The Tonka Tough Builders Playset is designed to ignite creativity and encourage open-ended play. Forget passive screen time; this set invites children to engage in active, hands-on building experiences that foster imagination and develop essential skills.  

  • 25 Colorful Building Blocks: This set comes with 25 brightly colored building blocks, providing a vibrant palette for young builders. From towering skyscrapers to whimsical creatures, the possibilities are as limitless as their imaginations. The variety of colors not only makes building more visually engaging but also provides a fantastic opportunity for color recognition and learning. Children can sort, stack, and identify different hues, turning playtime into a fun and educational experience. These blocks are perfectly sized for small hands, making them easy to grasp, manipulate, and stack, promoting fine motor skill development.  
  • Tonka Tough Hard Hat: Every construction worker needs a trusty hard hat, and this playset delivers! The included Tonka hard hat isn’t just a fun accessory; it’s a key element that enhances the role-playing experience. Children can slip on the hat and instantly transform into a construction foreman, ready to oversee their building projects. This encourages imaginative play and allows children to explore different roles and scenarios. The hat is designed with comfort and safety in mind, ensuring a secure and comfortable fit for hours of imaginative play.

The included storage bucket serves a dual purpose: it’s a convenient container for storing all the blocks when playtime is over, and it also doubles as a stable building base. Simply flip the bucket over, and you have a solid foundation for creating even more elaborate structures. This clever design not only keeps everything neatly contained but also expands the building possibilities. This also helps with easy clean up and storage.  
  • On-the-Go Fun: Whether you’re at home, visiting grandparents, or heading to the park, the Tonka Tough Builders Playset is ready to go. The convenient storage bucket features a sturdy handle, making it easy for children to carry their building blocks wherever they go. This portability ensures that the fun never has to stop, allowing children to engage in creative play anytime, anywhere. This also makes the playset great for travel.  

By combining these features, the Tonka Tough Builders Playset offers a comprehensive play experience that encourages creativity, develops essential skills, and provides hours of entertainment. It’s more than just a set of blocks; it’s a tool for building imaginations.  

75+ Years of Tough Play

For over 75 years, Tonka has been synonymous with durability, quality, and imaginative play. From its iconic steel trucks to its innovative playsets, Tonka has consistently delivered toys that stand the test of time. The Tonka Tough Builders Playset is a testament to this legacy, embodying the same commitment to quality and durability that has made Tonka a beloved brand for generations.  

Tonka’s history is rooted in creating toys that inspire active, hands-on play. In a world increasingly dominated by screens, Tonka encourages children to put down their devices and engage in real-world experiences. This focus on active play not only promotes physical activity but also fosters creativity, problem-solving skills, and social interaction.  

The Tonka Tough Builders Playset is designed to be passed down through generations, creating lasting memories and connecting families through shared play experiences. Just like the classic Tonka trucks that have been cherished for decades, this playset is built to withstand years of enthusiastic play. It’s a toy that can be enjoyed today and treasured for years to come.  

Loved by Kids and Parents

Parents appreciate the Tonka Tough Builders Playset for its ability to engage their children in constructive and imaginative play. The all-in-one design, with the storage bucket and building base, makes cleanup and organization a breeze. Parents also value the durability of the set, knowing that it can withstand the rigors of childhood play.  

Children are drawn to the vibrant colors, the fun hard hat, and the endless building possibilities. They love creating their own structures, pretending to be construction workers, and carrying their building blocks around in the convenient bucket. The playset sparks their imagination and encourages them to explore their creativity in a fun and engaging way.  

The Tonka Tough Builders Playset is more than just a toy; it’s an investment in your child’s development and a gateway to a world of imaginative play.

Specifications

  • Number of Pieces: 27 (25 blocks + 1 hat + 1 bucket)
  • Recommended Age Range: 18 months+
  • Materials: Durable, high-quality plastic
  • Care Instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth
